table.title: Duplex mismatch by host
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco_ios-duplex_mismatch | dedup dvc,cdp_local_interface | table _time,dvc,cdp_local_interface,cdp_neighbor,dest_interface,message_text | rename cdp_local_interface AS "Local Int.",cdp_neighbor AS "CDP Neighbor",dest_interface AS "Remote Int.",message_text AS "Message" | sort dvc
